# Tutorials Docs

## Tutorials

- [Build file-based apps](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/csharp/fundamentals/tutorials/file-based-programs.md): File-based apps are command line utilities that are built and execute without a project file. The build and run commands are implicit. New syntax supports project settings in source.
- [How to display command-line arguments](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/csharp/fundamentals/tutorials/how-to-display-command-line-arguments.md): Learn how to display command-line arguments. See a code example and view additional available resources.
- [Introduction to classes](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/csharp/fundamentals/tutorials/classes.md): Create your first C# program and explore object oriented concepts
- [Object-oriented C#](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/csharp/fundamentals/tutorials/oop.md): C# provides full support for object-oriented programming including abstraction, encapsulation, inheritance, and polymorphism.
- [Inheritance in C# and .NET](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/csharp/fundamentals/tutorials/inheritance.md): Learn to use inheritance in C# libraries and applications.
- [Generate API documentation with XML comments](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/csharp/fundamentals/tutorials/xml-documentation.md): Learn to add `///` comments that generate XML documentation directly from your source code. Learn which tags are available and how to add documentation blocks to types and members.
- [Converting types](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/csharp/fundamentals/tutorials/safely-cast-using-pattern-matching-is-and-as-operators.md): Learn to use pattern matching techniques to safely cast variables to a different type. You can use pattern matching as well as the is and as operators to safely convert types.
- [Build data-driven algorithms with pattern matching](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/csharp/fundamentals/tutorials/pattern-matching.md): This advanced tutorial demonstrates how to use pattern matching techniques to create functionality using data and algorithms that are created separately.
